name: 2D Madness Prototype 1.6
description:
Prototype of a level I am trying out.

The controls are:

  1. Left and Right arrow keys to move left and right.
  2. Space bar to Jump. Press space again in mid-air to stomp.
  3. When on a Purple wall, press up or down to move up or down and to jump off the wall press left or right.
